scripts.build: npm run purge && npm run bundle
scripts.postinstall: npm run build; echo ''; echo ' use' $(tput bold)npm start$(tput sgr0) or $(tput bold)npm run watch$(tput sgr0) to start developing.; echo ''; echo ' https://viperhtml.js.org/'; echo ''
scripts.purge: mkdir -p cdn; rm -rf cdn/*; mkdir -p public/js; rm -rf public/js/*.wp; rm -rf public/sw.js
scripts.template-to-view: for f in $(ls viper/template/*.html);do f="$(basename $f)";f="viper/view/${f:0:$((${#f}-5))}";echo 'module.exports = (render, model) => render`'>"$f.js";cat "viper/template/$(basename $f).html">>"$f.js";echo '`;'>>"$f.js"; done
scripts.watch: npm run build && (npm run watch-template & npm run watch-client & npm run watch-server) && exit 0
